name: MOSOLOV demo-game
description:
The game about exploring and finding a way out of the dark. All spaces are empty and lifeless, although once they were inhabited, they were used, everything worked and developed. But now this is a shapeless and empty world of turned-off appliances and frozen mechanisms. What happened and why had everything stopped? Why is everything in darkness? Probably, it also should be found out.

MOSOLOV is a small game, a proof of concept, created by a small independent team of developers (DIASURA Team). This is a kind of concept of visual style, atmosphere and a bit of gameplay of what we want to see in a full game.
